title: Episode 73 - We All Have Marketing Failures
author: All About Digital Marketing
summary: Today's episode is all about marketing failures. Just like in business and in life, we all have failures. But it's not about the failures themselves. As cliché as it sounds, it's about what you learn from those mistakes.   Here's the thing, we don't know any marketers that have no failures. We know marketers who are too interested in their ego to admit to their failures, but we all have them. In fact, digital marketing is basically built on failures and lessons learnt.   It's how we test, exp...
